author: trustin
msg: Made sure the queued message in ProtocolCodecFilter is flushed out when resumeRead() is invoked.  To implement this, SocketIoProcessor and DatagramConnectorDelegate fire a messageReceived event with an empty buffer.  I made sure all filters process it correctly.  It's somewhat a kind of hack, but I though it's very easy to implement and affects only IoFilters.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added an update of all its parents when updating an AT or OC.

author: ema
msg: [CXF-362] Improved code style for generate impl class

author: ukuester
msg: The patch is for updating to Portlet Specification Version 2.0 Public Draft , Rev. 21.
